name: Verizon Communications Inc.
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. is a leading global telecommunications company headquartered in New York City. It provides wireless, internet, TV, and technology services to consumers, businesses, and government agencies, serving over 150 countries and nearly all Fortune 500 companies. As of 2025, Verizon is the largest wireless carrier in the United States by subscribers and continues to innovate in 5G and network connectivity.
